  IArticleOptions,
  IBasket,
  ICategory,
  IExtra,
  ILocation,
  INotification,
  IProduct,

    type: 'office',
    business: false,
    read: false,
    createdAt: dayjs().subtract(12, 'h').toDate(),
  },
];

export default {
  USERS,
  FOLLOWING,
  TRENDING,
  CATEGORIES,
  ARTICLES,
  RECOMMENDATIONS,
  MESSSAGES,
  EXTRAS,
  NOTIFICATIONS,
};
